Meta.title: Batch Processing
Meta.author: OmegaPlatinum
Meta.description:
Allows crafting stations such as the sawmill and kiln to process multiple ingredients per operation. 製材所や窯などのクラフト設備で、1回の作業で複数の材料を処理できるようにします。
[h1] Features [/h1] [list] [*] [*] [*] [/list]
[h1] Compatibility [/h1] Works with existing save files.
Supports Game Version:
[h1] 特徴 [/h1] [list] [*] [*] [*] [/list]
[h1] 互換性 [/h1] 既存のセーブデータと互換性があります。
対応ゲームバージョン:
